name: Clapping Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to make a perfect clap every single time?

Clapping simulator has this and much, much more!

- Impressive photorealistic graphics

-Unique art style

-Real time stats to let you know how many claps you've done

-Cool, crazy, and interesting titles to allow you to show off to your friends how high you've gotten

-And so many more interesting features!
